text: geudeul-i eoneu gos-eseo balgyeondoedeon geudeul wie chiyogseuleoum-i naelyeo jilila geuleona hananim-ui dong-ajul-i na salamdeul-ui bohosog-e issneun jadeul eun je-oela geudeul-eun seuseuloga hana nim-ui bunnoleul cholaehaess-euni geudeul-wie bingonham-i naelyeojidoda igeos-eun geudeul i hananim-ui malsseum-eul bulsinhago ye eonjadeul-eul budanghage salhaehayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-i hananim-ui myeonglyeong-eul geoyeoghan daegala
